title: The End - The Fortnite Chapter 2 Finale Event Teaser Trailer
author: Fortnite
description:
Watch the teaser trailer of The End of Fortnite Chapter 2. For more details visit: https://fn.gg/TheEnd

The Cube Queen prepares her endgame for the Island and nothing will ever be the same. Battle for your legacy on December 4 at 4 PM ET.

Grab your weapons and fight the ultimate destroyer of all reality. Squad up with your friends and players around the world to take on the Sideways corruption. To immortalize “The End,” players who fight back The Cube Queen by attending “The End” will unlock a special Loading Screen and Wrap!

Fortnite Chapter 2 is ending making way for Chapter 3!

#Fortnite #FortniteTheEnd #FortniteChapter2

localize.title: The End - The Fortnite Chapter 2 Finale Event ティザートレーラー
结束--《堡垒之夜》第二章终结篇活动预告
結束--《堡壘之夜》第二章終結篇活動預告
